workspace.name: the shop
workspace.description: DigitalOcean Gradient workspace for internal Dev-Tools automation agents

knowledge_bases.name: Dev-Tools Docs Corpus
knowledge_bases.description: Documentation bundle generated from the Dev-Tools repository
knowledge_bases.datasource_notes: Upload the docs zip or wire a Spaces bucket per Create and Manage Knowledge Bases guide.

agents.name: DevTools Orchestrator
agents.description: Routes incoming tasks to the feature, infra, CICD, and documentation agents
agents.instruction: You are the Dev-Tools orchestrator. Coordinate requests across downstream agents and surface Langfuse/Prometheus traces when asked.
